div.head: 鯁咽
div.div: choking on a fishbone stuck in the gullet

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: choking on a fishbone stuck in the gullet

sense.def: Pathological Condition of geng yan 哽咽 , choking, caused by a fishbone stuck in the throat. BCGM SE yi tang 飴糖 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 魚骨哽在喉中 , “Choking on a fishbone stuck in the throat”. writes: 魚骨鯁咽 , “ Choking on a fishbone stuck in the gullet ”.
